Dear Customer,

Please note that you are in default in payment of purchase price as per the payment schedule in the Contract. As per the Dubai Land Department rules and regulations you shall be liable to pay the total amount of AED ${'{:,.2f}'.format(object.property_id.total_price)} from the Unit purchase price, therefore we request you to settle the outstanding amount within (30) days from date of Serving this Notification.

طبقا لقواعد ولوائح دائرة الأراضي والأملاك / دبي ، فإنكم ملزمين بسداد المبلغ المستحق والبالغ قدره ${'{:,.2f}'.format(object.property_id.total_price)} درهم من سعر شراء الوحدة، وبالتالي نطلب منكم سداد المبلغ المستحق المذكور خلال 30 يوم من تاريخ توجيه هذا الاشعار

Should you fail to pay the full outstanding amount within the timescales set out above otherwise we will proceed to the judicial procedures, we hereby reserve our rights under the contract, and to commence legal proceedings as per Dubai Laws / UAE including law No. (13) / 2008 And its amendments and resolution of the Executive Council No. (6) Of 2010.
